name: EntityList
title: Entity List
description: Displays entities in a grid or card layout with sorting capabilities
functionalRequirements:
## Entity List Requirements

- Display entities in grid or card view based on viewMode prop
- Support sorting by multiple fields
- Handle entity selection and notify parent
- Show loading state while data loads
- Display record count badges
- Highlight selected entity
- Support keyboard navigation
technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- entities: Array of entity objects
- viewMode: 'grid' | 'card'
- selectedEntityId: Currently selected entity
- onSelectEntity: Callback when entity selected
- sortBy: Current sort field
- sortDirection: 'asc' | 'desc'
- onSortChange: Callback for sort changes

### Rendering
- Grid mode: Compact table with columns
- Card mode: Cards with entity info
- Sort indicators in headers
- Selection highlighting

properties.name: entities
properties.description: Array of entity objects to display

properties.name: viewMode
properties.description: Display mode - grid or card view

properties.name: selectedEntityId
properties.description: ID of the currently selected entity

properties.name: onSelectEntity
properties.description: Callback when an entity is selected

events.name: onSelectEntity
events.description: Fired when an entity is selected

exampleUsage:
<EntityList
  entities={entities}
  viewMode={viewMode}
  selectedEntityId={selectedEntityId}
  onSelectEntity={handleSelectEntity}
  sortBy={sortBy}
  sortDirection={sortDirection}
  onSortChange={handleSortChange}
  utilities={utilities}
  styles={styles}
  components={components}
  callbacks={callbacks}
/>
